'''Strange Sumeru Rose''' is a quest item available during the quests ''[[The Start of Contamination]]'' and ''[[Into the Hinterland]]'' during [[Tighnari]]'s [[Story Quest]]: [[Vulpes Zerda Chapter]]: Act I - [[The Unanswerable Problems]].
